SEARCH
Package com.gcu.carstoreapplication.service

Interface UserServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface UserServiceInterface
Interface for user-related service operations. This interface defines methods for retrieving all users, retrieving a user by their username, and adding a new user.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addUser(UserModel user)
    Adds a new user to the system.
    List<UserModel>
    getAllUsers()
    Retrieves all users from the system.
    UserModel
    getUserByUsername(String userName)
    Retrieves a user by their username.

  • Method Details

    • getAllUsers

      List<UserModel> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users from the system.
      Returns:
      a list of UserModel representing all users

    • getUserByUsername

      UserModel getUserByUsername(String userName)
      Retrieves a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the UserModel representing the user with the specified username

    • addUser

      boolean addUser(UserModel user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserModel containing the details of the user to add
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added, false otherwise
